title: Medical Treatment (Short Stay) visa (subclass 675)
summary: This page provides information about the discontinued Medical Treatment (Short Stay) visa (subclass 675) and guidance for current visa holders. It explains rights, obligations, allowed activities, extending stay options, and circumstances for applying for another visa, particularly the Medical Treatment visa (subclass 602).

alternative_visa.when_applicable: If you want to come to Australia for medical treatment or consultations, or if you need to join a subclass 675 visa holder for support.

structured_data.validity_for_existing_holders: Valid until the expiry date given when the visa was granted
structured_data.audience: People who have already been granted a Medical Treatment (Short Stay) visa (subclass 675)

can_do: Stay in Australia for medical treatment
Stay for medical treatment on one or more visits for a period no longer than three months at a time
Study for up to three months
Study for more than three months if under 18 years of age and with written permission from the Minister, provided there are compelling and compassionate reasons due to a change in circumstances
cannot_do: Work in Australia, except under limited circumstances
must_do: Comply with all visa conditions and Australian laws
Leave Australia before the visa ends unless granted another visa

vevo_information.description: Visa holders can use VEVO to check visa details and entitlements

allowed_reasons_for_new_visa: If medical treatment will continue after the current visa ends
For holiday, sightseeing, visiting friends or relatives, or other purposes
extending_stay.requirement: The next visa must be applied for and granted before the current visa expires

support_persons.who_can_apply: Someone who wants to accompany the visa holder to provide emotional and other support during treatment

in_australia.destination: Canberra office in Australian Capital Territory - attention Specialist Temporary Entry Centre
payment_methods: Money order payable to the Department of Home Affairs

outside_australia.lodgement_method: Lodge at one of the immigration offices outside Australia

leaving_australia.expectation: You are expected to leave Australia before your visa ends
leaving_australia.possibility_of_another_visa: You can apply for another visa in Australia if more medical treatment is required and you have a medical treatment plan
leaving_australia.note: Medical Treatment visas are usually granted for a short time, and returning to your home country is expected

things_to_notify: Changes to phone number, email, address or passport
change_notification_requirements.consequence_of_not_updating_passport: You may experience significant delays at the airport and possibly be denied permission to board your plane
